description: Fix health-mvp test/app mismatch by adding /health page route for E2E health checks.
note: Issue #33 COMPLETE (2025-11-24). Added /health page route (frontend/src/pages/Health.tsx) and updated E2E tests to navigate to /health instead of root. All health-mvp matrix jobs passing (chromium, firefox, msedge). Fixed duplicate import in golden-screens.spec.ts. CI green on main.
